name: Bombs and Bullets
description:
Bombs and Bullets, or BnB, is a real time strategy game in the style of the Command and Conquer series, in particular taking inspiration from Command and Conquer Generals. You can construct buildings, build units, and destroy the enemy base.

The current version is very bare bones, but we're working on a lot of new features and assets that will be added in the near future.

There is a functioning map editor with a small tile set, but very few objects other than the default faction's military assets. More will be added in the future.

There is no functioning enemy AI at the moment, but LAN multiplayer does work. You can play your against your friends online via Hamachi.
